label: ham
subject:
svn commit: samba r23692 - in branches: SAMBA_3_0/source/modules
	SAMBA_3_0_26/source/modules
body: From the fact that the quantity of gold in circulation depends on the variable sum total of prices of commodities and the varying rapidity of circulation, it follows that the volume of the circulating medium must be capable of contraction and expansion; in short, that according to the requirements of circulation, gold must now enter, now leave the sphere of circulation in its capacity of a medium of circulation. How the circulation process itself realizes these conditions, we shall see later on.
